articles.title: Cardinal Prevost elected next pope, first American pontiff - PBS
articles.description: Cardinals chose the new pope on their second day of the papal conclave.
articles.content: VATICAN CITY (AP) Robert Prevost, a missionary who spent his career ministering in Peru and leads the Vatican’s powerful office of bishops, was elected the first American pope in the 2,000-year histo… [+3908 chars]
